EmailTemplate.description: SFDC1-5148 Informs client that their permissions have been updated for list of products.
EmailTemplate.name: Clearing Permissions (upon completion)
EmailTemplate.subject: Your IHS Markit Customer Care Case {!Case.CaseNumber} - Clearing permissions
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Clearing permissions have now been made live to clear <product1>, <product2> and <product3> at <include full clearing house name> between the below legal entities:
<Legal Entity Name 1> <Legal Entity BIC 1>
<Legal Entity Name 2> <Legal Entity BIC 2>
Please note all eligible currencies will clear unless private clearing rules have been set up stating otherwise.
Regards {!Case.OwnerFullName} MarkitSERV Client Services
